body: Dude, I'm loving the teacher arc and the characters. I can already see where it's going though. The girl is going to get jealous and end up claiming the teacher raped her or something. So far, her character is a complete bitch.
Great art and story, but it takes way too long to move forward. I should just wait until next summer to check back when it's all done and uploaded, and I can read all at once :P
